name: Behind Closed Doors - demo
description:
Behind Closed Doors is a murder mystery game that asks player to figure out what happened to their missing friends. The story is told through a series of recorded phone calls that can be found throughout the house – some of which may cause certain objects to spring to life and recreate what happened during the phone call.

The first two stories of the game have been implemented, but more will be coming soon!

Game design, programming, and story by Kat Keller.

A full list of credits can be found here.
